title: My Town: Home Dollhouse: Kids Play Life house game
description:
Create your own family life story with My Town
Do you remember growing up in your town with a doll house and all the hours you‚Äôd play & create with dolls & their home? Kids love to play games & create fun little life stories. The My Town Home Doll house game is the perfect play game for kids. With a house they can call home, kids can interact & play with just about anything in it. This is a doll house in the miga city town with lots of rooms & fun family characters (mom, pepi dad, kids) just waiting for little kids (boys, girls) to play with and create their super world life story. üè°üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶

Experience the Super My Town Family Doll House
My Town : Home Dollhouse is a kids play & life story game! It is your doll house where everything is interactive & fun to play & create. In My Town, one of the best life play games, adventures are ahead every time you open up the My Town app & enter the games world. Kids can interact & play with almost every item they see in the My Town home game world & create their life story. Live through the day in the miga city town with your different little doll characters including mom, pepi dad, or kids (boy, girls). In the My Town home story game, they can then go into the kitchen & treat themselves to their favorite breakfast! Boys & girls can use their super creativity & imagination in so many different ways as they play in the family life game & create their little life story with mom, pepi dad and kids in the miga city town doll house. üè°

The only limit in My Town is your world & life imagination! Play any life story in the family house in town with the amazing little doll house game! The game is perfect for little 6 year olds girls or boys. üëßüë¶

MY TOWN FEATURES üéâ
*6 detailed rooms in the house including a living room, kitchen, or little kids (girls, boys) room with fun outfits to dress up in, bathroom & back yard - a complete play home & miga city house for a family! 
*Many family characters to play with in the house, including a mom, pepi dad & six kids (boys, girls) aged 6 to 12.
*Pure open ended story play & fun in the house of the My Town game world without stress. Create your own little life story with mom, pepi dad, & kids in the miga city town house!

What Type of play can kids (boys, girls) have in the doll house home game world? 
The My Town : Home Dollhouse game has everything a real world house in any miga city has of fun play! Little kids can play, write their life story & have fun dress up games where they play. Kids could also have cooking games where they pretend to have a family breakfast or dinner. Very much like a real doll house, kids play their life story at home. üçΩüõåüõÄ

RECOMMENDED AGE GROUP
Kids 4-12 (boys, girls): My Town story games are safe to play even when parents (pepi dad, mum) are not at home, not in the house or city. üë∂üë¶üëß

ABOUT THE MY TOWN WORLD üïπüåç
The My Town Games studio designs doll house games that promote creativity & open ended play for your little girls & boys all over the world. Loved by kids & parents in a family alike, My Town games introduce world environments & life experiences of imaginative games play at home. The company has offices all around the world where games like My Town are created for kids to play & create their own little life house story all around the world. For more information about our games, please visit www.my-town.com

title: I See Sam Beginning Reading
description:
Equip your students with essential reading skills while building their self-confidence.  Excite your students with engaging storylines and fun interactive features.  Ensure mastery using easy-to-administer assessments.  Empower your students by customizing support features and systematically building preschool-to-3rd grade reading skills. 

---Features---
Teachers May Control Student Tablets
Easy-to-use Audio-based Prompts and Modeling of Words and Sounds
Audio Record and Playback Student Reading
Review and Share Audio Recordings of Your Readers‚Äô Practice
Track Progress of Multiple Students
Aligned with Common Core State Standards
Research-Proven Skill Introduction Sequence
Engaging Artwork and Storylines
Gradual, Systematic Introduction of New Material

---Highly Customizable Controls---
Turn Off/On Audio Cues
Turn Off/On Read to Me 
Turn Off/On Audio Recording
Hide/Unhide Story Pictures

---Reading Skills Addressed---
Phonemic Awareness
Alphabetic Principle
Decoding
Oral Reading Fluency
Reading Comprehension
   
Reading For All Learners is Flexible: Use the program for one-on-one, small-group, large-group, instructor-led, or independent practice settings. The Reading For All Learners iPad edition is fully compatible with the print edition of Reading For All Learners.  The print edition, available at www.iseesam.com, is a great companion to the app and can be used to support home-school partnerships.

Reading For All Learners is Effective:  This evidence-based reading program has been used around the world to successfully teach both proficient, or struggling readers, and those with disabilities. Now, the program is available as an app, which includes many new research-aligned, interactive features. 

Reading For All Learners is Systematic: Each of the 141 books builds on the skills of the previous books, gradually introducing new skills, with repeated opportunities to practice newly introduced skills.  The sequential introduction of skills and practice opportunities in Reading For All Learners has been refined by scientific research and feedback from parents, teachers, and tutors during the last 40 years.  Quickly and precisely determine if your students have mastered new content using the brief assessments embedded in the program. Reading For All Learners is 100% decodable ‚Äì Before your students meet a word in a story, they have the opportunity to practice the sounds that make up the word and a chance to practice the word itself. Ensuring each story is 100% decodable builds student confidence and enhances fluency and comprehension. 

Reading For All Learners is aligned with: 

Reading Foundational Skills(RF) in the Common Core State Standards
Reading Literature Skills (RL) in the Common Core State Standards
National Reading Panel Report (NRP, 2000)
Leading Current Reading Research (visit www.iseesam.com)
The National Institute for Literacy Findings on Kindergarten to Third Grade Reading Instruction (Put Reading First: The Research Building Blocks for Teaching Children to Read!)

This program puts you in charge of teaching. This unique edition of Reading For All Learners captures the ‚Äútried and true‚Äù sequence and engaging stories of the print program in a flexible, easy-to-use, digital form. The Reading For All Learners iPad edition adds many new features, all under your control, and is designed to help improve crucial reading skills in your learner.

title: Show and Tell
description:
Show And Tell is a story creator, a simple and fun way to make stories and events using your tablet or phone. Kids, parents and teachers can use it to create your own story with pictures, video, sounds and text-to-speech. From kindergarten circle to special education, anyone can benefit from this new way of expressing memories and ideas.

Each story is organized in pages with a picture, video and text. The pages can have a sound clip attached or text-to-speech interpretation. The  pictures and sounds can  be selected from device albums or recorded instantly. A draw and handwriting pad is available for Samsung Galaxy / Note S Pen. The stories can be added and edited with an easy to use  wizard. Fun effects can be added with the integrated Aviary photo editor. The stories can be saved as PDF and e-mailed.  The entire story can also be shared by email with other Show And Tell users.

This app is useful for young children, teens and even adults. It can be easily used as a photo album, a collection of children‚Äôs drawings, or a quick way to record travel memories. 

The application is particularly useful for teachers, therapists and parents. It allows for quick creation of personalized sequenced stories, with the possibility of introducing own photographs, video, text and audio recording. The application is best suited for young children or children with reduced speech clarity, learning disabilities, autism, behavior difficulties, developmental disabilities and/or emerging  language abilities (nonverbal communication, speech therapy).
 
Show and Tell provides the adults working with the children with a powerful tool to stimulate language, including comprehension, oral  expressive skills, reading and writing skills. The app can be used to create social narratives to depict common social problems or conflicts  and ways to address them in a socially acceptable way. The app allows for maximum flexibility on the part of the adult designing the story  for the child. For example, if the teacher chose to draw small figurines on paper to depict emotions and actions, then a picture can be taken  and ‚Äúvoila‚Äù, a story was created which can then be used over and over again, until the target behavior  is learned. 

The app allows the user to create sequenced stories which are often key for early language and literacy development. The stories created can  be used as a basis for expanding conversations, introducing the story elements to the child or introducing more details and richness to the conversational exchange. 

The stories can be used to support children with severe articulation disorders, oral language difficulties, nonverbal or autistic children. The parents or teacher may create simple stories to depict an activity that the child has done, then use the app to allow the child to share the information with others, familiar or  unfamiliar peers and adults, in order to expand the range of people that the child communicates with. 

If the focus is on Vocabulary and concept development, the teacher or parent may take pictures of multiple objects depicting a concept that  is a focus for the child  (such as colors, numbers, sizes, etc), then create a quick story for the child to refer to. 

The app may be used to create early literacy individualized alphabet books to aid children who are struggling to make the connection between  the letters and their respective sounds through association with pictures of personally meaningful things. A familiar voice recording would increase familiarity  and ensure faster connections are made.  

Children with working memory difficulties may benefit from the stories created with Show and Tell to replay a sequence of familiar events for  quick reference. For example, a child may use a story which replays the steps required to do a pen and paper exercise in class or homework. 
 
A demo version is available on Google Play, search "wsisat" and select Show And Tell Demo.

comments: This is a great tool for video modeling. My son has PDD-NOS (ASD). Is fully verbal but still has a hard time recalling stories or telling us about his day. title: Connect the dots for toddler
description:
*** Full Version of the App - No further purchase required *** 

*** Fun EDUCATIONAL game for toddlers of AGE 3.5 and up 
*** Connect the dots, LEARN NUMBERS, DRAWING and COUNTING
*** Developed with certified child psychologists 
*** 12 beautiful mini-game boards 

About the game: 
----------------- 
The game consists of 12 mini game boards each presents a beautiful and magical scene. Each board contains several parts. The parts can be completed by connecting the numbered dots in a specific order. Upon completion, each part is dragged to gradually build an object. When all parts are drawn the scene is magically created and revealed.

The game is designed to enhance the following skills: 
- Numbers and counting
- Hand-eye coordination 
- Visual perception 
- Concentration

All our products are designed and developed in cooperation with certified child psychologists and experienced educators.

TinyHands Games:
 
TinyHands Sorting Series
A set of sorting games designed to help children acquire basic concepts such as shape, color, size seasons and animals. Game boards are organized in an ascending difficulty level starting from basic sorting followed by more complex context based sorting and classification environments.

TinyHands Towers Series
A set of stacking games. The game is designed to help children acquire basic concepts such as: big VS. small, before VS. after, and bottom VS. top. Game boards are organized in an ascending difficulty level.

TinyHands What's My Pair Series
A series of three pair matching games. The game challenges the child to match pairs, initially based on visual aspects alone and in more advanced screens based on logic and understanding of card content.

TinyHands First Words Series
A set of vocabulary games for children of age 1.5 and up.
The game consists of 10 boards, each focused on a different theme from the child's world such as shapes, colors, clothes, animals and vehicles.

TinyHands Raccoon TreeHouse
This game is intended for toddlers aged 3+. The game presents 12 boards each focused on developing a set of basic concepts such as size, colors, numbers and patterns using everyday objects from the child's world such as clothes, food and many more.

TinyHands Town Center
Educational game recommended for age 3+. This game includes 10 beautiful boards each focused on developing a set of basic concepts such as size, colors, numbers and patterns using everyday objects from the child's world such as clothes, food and many more.

Note for parents:
Like all our games, this game is designed to provide quality playtime for parents and children together. Playing along with your children is highly recommended and will surely make them benefit the most from this app and help them expand their vocabulary.

We are sure that your children will enjoy this exciting educational game that will encourage their thinking and contribute to the development of their basic skills.

About the Team: 
We believe that children learn best through playing. We teamed up with certified child psychologists and experienced educators out of desire to create fun games that will help our children acquire new concepts and improve their skills. In addition, we design our games to provide quality playtime for parents and children together.

title: CBM Humanitarian Hands-on Tool
description:
A learning and reference tool for humanitarian aid workers and those who wish to learn more about inclusive aid, provided by CBM.

CBM is an international Christian disability and development organisation, transforming the lives of disabled people in the world's poorest communities.

Driven by Christian values, we work with disabled people to break down barriers by delivering practical support, improving policy and practice and inspiring the people of the UK to act.

Our vision is an inclusive world in which all people with disabilities enjoy their human rights and achieve their full potential.

Last year, our supporters helped us to change the lives of thousands of people with disabilities.

Bible

Great App. But I would recommend some upgrades. When I search for a word (eg. Sun) in the Bible and see the results, only the beginning of all verses will appear in searching results and in most cases the word I am searching for, will not appear. So I have to open that verse to find the word, eg. in the Pslams. This app is awesome. Its contents are numerous and interesting still it's very easy to use. But, occasionally, after downloading certain videos at night, the platform sends a message that the videos are not available. I think it would be better for the platform to prevent me from downloading the videos when the videos are not available, instead of allowing me to download it after which it sends a message that the videos aren't available.

Extremely user friendly and all videos well made simplistic teaching tools. This app is amazing ,so efficient in accessing spiritual food .But I think it would have been much better if it had a 'search' option right away from the home page where one can search publications or articles that are far deep into different categories.

comments: Zap Zap Math is a great supplement to any Math curriculum your child might be using. My son loves doing the daily missions. The game is very entertaining, with a great reward system. The instructions are clear, and concise, unlike some other math games we have tried. There are some many things to do he never gets bored when he is practicing. The 'practice' is definitely on grade level. It is worth upgrading to a premium account.

This is perfect for my 7-year-old.  She gets so easily frustrated by math but this game keeps her entertained, learning, and CALM.  I love that she no longer gets mad at her device for being too hard.  But I know she's learning new things too.  It's a great balance!

I am blown away by this app.  I homeschool my kids so it was better I use the premium version.  I have access to all of zapzap math k-6th grade.  Necause I homeschool I needed something that really would help the kids understand the math I teach them.  Of course my kids hate math and it was always a fight to get them to do their work.  I was hopeful about this app but honestly thought I was going to have to stay on them to practice.  I couldn't have been more wrong. title: Zillow: Find Houses for Sale & Apartments for Rent
description:
Take control of your next move with the Zillow app. Our best-in-class features help you unlock life‚Äôs next chapter by getting into a home you love. 

BUY A HOME ‚Äì Find your place with immersive photos, virtual tours, and the most listings, including things you won‚Äôt find anywhere else.

SELL A HOME ‚Äì Whether you sell directly to Zillow with Zillow Offers‚Ñ¢ or take a traditional approach, we‚Äôll help you navigate the path to a successful sale.

RENT A HOME ‚Äì From shopping on the largest rental network to automating applications, we‚Äôve created a seamless online experience for renters.

The Zillow app gives you resources and tools you won‚Äôt find anywhere else, so you can shop smarter for your next home:

‚Ä¢ The most listings and constant updates so you never miss out¬π
‚Ä¢ 3D Home Tours so you can picture yourself in a home and narrow down which houses to visit in person 
‚Ä¢ Self Tour for Zillow-owned homes, with no appointment and no pressure. Stop by when it‚Äôs convenient and unlock the door with the app
‚Ä¢ Zestimate¬Æ, the industry-leading independent home valuation tool, calculated daily
‚Ä¢ Robust filters for school districts, views, pricing, pets, HOAs, and more
‚Ä¢ Easier co-shopping: Tag your favorite home features and share your favorites to coordinate your search with a partner or roommate
‚Ä¢ Push notifications to let you know when houses come to market, have a sale pending, or drop in price 
‚Ä¢ Neighborhood details including restaurants, grocery stores, parks, and coffee shops
‚Ä¢ Easy access to Zillow Premier Agents, local real estate experts who meet Zillow‚Äôs bar for quality customer service
‚Ä¢ All the pricing and details you need to compare homes & apartments for rent 
‚Ä¢ A personal renter profile so you can visit a house rental and engage directly with potential landlords and property managers who rent homes

1. Most listing based on direct site comparisons

recentChanges: We are always working hard to improve our apps. This is a small update to fix a few bugs. Please continue to send your feedback to androidfeedback@zillow.com. We appreciate it.
comments: Its ok. Its best for home window shopping. If you're seriously looking, it's less convenient. It assumes how much you're going to put down and what interest rate you've been approved for. There's no way to set those things so it gives you a more accurate idea of what you're paying each month. Plus, in my area theres a lot of 55+ communities and theres no way to filter those out, which is irritating.

I like this app, overall, but would really love to have the ability to hide or dismiss a property from my search, if it's not one that meets my needs. I like that I can save homes, but when searching later, homes keep popping up that I would rather not look at again! Also, if there is a way to get HOA/Space rent to be mandatory when there is one for the property, that would be great. I've looked at many that stated there was none, but that wasn't true. Thanks!

Zillow gave the option to turn off cookies, but did not bother to mention that it will erase all of your data when you do this. I went ahead and typed everything in once again, and it erased it AGAIN. Also, you can't add photos, videos, or tours with any Android phone -only i0s I want to know what kind of incentive apple is giving developers to leave these flaws in their designs..

I use this app almost daily, it keeps me up to date on homes that I am very interested in. We will be buying or building in the next 5 months, we are looking forward to building or buying our dream home. I love Zillow, I have found it to be more up to date than a Real Estate office. I highly recommend Zillow. Thank you, carolintallahassee

While the interface is the best I've seen out of all the other real estate options, the information is not accurate or up to date. If you try to get information from the listing agent on the app, a third party starts messaging you and sending your information to unrelated agents. I simply messaged asking about an open house and some random dude was trying to get me a new buyer's agent even though I already have one.

title: Kidsa English ‚Äì English course for kids
description:
Welcome to the KIDSA ENGLISH CHILDREN'S COURSE, the only full-featured, sequential English course in the world for children ages 2 to 8.

In a safe and fun environment, your child will learn English naturally, in a simple, playful,
dynamic and contextualized way, through the CLIL methodology - Content and Language
Integrated Learning.

There are many educational activities on the Kidsa english app including, mini classes with fun teachers, story times, arts and crafts, games, animations and family activities. Your child will learn english, word and phrases, in a natural and organic way. There are 72 topics that explore a child‚Äôs perspective of every-day life like:
- FAMILY AND FAMILY ACTIVITIES
- FOOD, MEALS AND A HEALTHY DIET
- PARTS OF THE BODY, HEALTH AND PERSONAL HYGIENE
- SCHOOL SUPPLIES AND SCHOOL LIFE.
- NUMBERS, SHAPES AND THE ENGLISH ALPHABET.
- GAMES AND TOYS
- GREETINGS, MAGIC WORDS AND GOOD ACTIONS.
- FRIENDSHIP
- RESPECT FOR NATURE AND ANIMALS, RECYCLING AND SO MUCH MORE!
If this is your child first English-language contact, do not worry! KIDSA ENGLISH was structured so that children have full autonomy in the learning process.

A 12 LEVEL ENGLISH COURSE!

Kidsa english was made by educators, pedagogues, and other language specialists with a

comments: Products are very cute with reasonable prices BUT it doesn't resume from where I left, for example if I am in the middle of the page searching for something in the 'baby girl' category and due to some work I paused for a few minutes and my phone got locked up, and when I am ready to continue, it doesn't show from where I left, instead it starts all over again from the home page.

Pretty decent app especially compared to similar ones out there. Expected delivery to take forever but was impressed it only took roughly a week (at least in the UK). Every single item is packed neatly and individually, quality so far was amazing, clothing so soft and the size right on point! Love all the discounts! There is room for improvement, such as the filters which don't always work (when choosing to see only a certain size, age etc), but overall I'm impressed and will keep on buying!

The filters don't always work well which can be frustrating. The sizing of the clothes are not consistent. You also don't always get what is pictured. For e.g. I thought I was getting a set but it was only a top. I bought several items and satisfied with about half of what I received. Still on the fence about ordering again even with a voucher they sent me.

I love shopping with PatPat! I'm Australian, so I was surprised how quick shipping is. The quality of clothing is great and the range of bright coloured clothing for boys is brilliant! It's so great to see an affordable clothing company doing bright clothing for boys rather than the boring blues, greys and browns you usually have to choose from at most shops. They have awesome sales too. I've been receiving lots of comments from strangers about my son's cool clothing.

I like the clothes but the quality of some dresses is good and some not that good. And patpat made some levels if you reach that level you will receive some gift voucher every month but unfortunately they are not doing it, they have provided 1 month after that we need to chase them for the rewards. Instead of understanding customer querry they just want to debate with customers, I feel it's unprofessional and they need to improve customer service.

title: Autism:How to Help your Child
description:
If your child -- or the child of a close friend or relative -- has just received a diagnosis of autism, you are probably feeling baffled and overwhelmed. It is never easy to learn that someone you love has a serious health or developmental condition. Learning all you can about the disorder -- and where to get help -- will ease your fear and confusion. It can also provide the tools you need to find the support that children with autism -- and you -- really need.

How to Identify Children With Autism
Autism is a developmental disorder that appears in early childhood. Autism is the most common condition in a related constellation of disorders known as autism spectrum disorders, also called ASDs. Other autism spectrum disorders include Asperger's syndrome and pervasive developmental disorder, or PDD. Autism and other autism spectrum disorders can be difficult to diagnose, because the symptoms and degree of impairment -- ranging from mild to severe -- are different for every child.

Some features of autism include:

Social withdrawal
Verbal or nonverbal communication problems
Rigid and repetitive behavior
In severe cases, an autistic child may never learn to speak or make eye contact. But many children with autism and other autism spectrum disorders are able to live relatively normal lives.
Signs and Symptoms in Children With Autism
Autism usually appears before a child is 3 years old. Some signs of autism may be evident as early as 10 to 12 months, and certainly by 18 months.

Varying widely, signs and symptoms in children with autism typically include:

Impaired communication skills
Difficulty making eye contact
Repetitive behaviors and activities such as arm flapping, head banging, or twirling an object over and over
Rigid behavior and difficulty with change and transitions
Narrow range of interests and activities
What Causes Autism?
Experts do not know exactly what causes autism. In the past, people blamed parenting practices, which added a burden of guilt and shame on parents already struggling to cope with a disabled child. Today, most scientists believe that a combination of genetic and environmental factors cause autism.


Recent research confirms multiple genetic abnormalities that can predisposition someone to autism. Several genes have been implicated. In addition, there may be metabolic or biochemical factors that can cause autism spectrum disorders. Other research is looking at environmental triggers, including exposure to certain viruses. But a number of comprehensive studies have totally disproved the purported link between vaccines and ASD.

Over the last decade, there has been a dramatic increase in the number of diagnosed cases of autism in the U.S. and around the world. Experts do not know if this is because the disorder is actually on the rise, or if doctors are simply diagnosing it more effectively. We should learn more answers to questions like these over the next few years. That's because many researchers are currently looking into autism's origins, prevalence, and treatment.

Create the Disney Park of your dreams, filled with beloved Disney, Pixar and STAR WARS‚Ñ¢ characters, exciting attractions and special events! Join over 90 million players worldwide who have embraced their inner child building their own magical place on mobile.

_____________________________________________
You can download and play this game for free. Please be informed that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game, or by deciding to watch certain advertisements, or by paying with real money. Purchases of virtual currency using real money are performed using a credit card, or other form of payment associated with your account, and are activated when you input your Google Play account password, without the need to re-enter your credit card number or PIN. 
In-app purchases can be restricted by adjusting the authentication settings within your Play Store settings (Google Play Store Home > Settings > Require authentication for purchases) and setting up a password for each purchase / Every 30 minutes or Never. 
Disabling password protection may result in unauthorized purchases. We strongly encourage you to keep password protection turned on if you have children or if others could have access to your device.
This game contains advertising for Gameloft‚Äôs products or some third parties which will redirect you to a third-party site. You can disable your device‚Äôs ad identifier being used for interest-based advertising in the settings menu of your device. This option can be found in the Settings app > Accounts (Personal) > Google > Ads (Settings and Privacy) > Opt out of interest-based ads.
Certain aspects of this game will require the player to connect to the Internet. 
Minimum Device Requirements:
CPU: Dual-Core 1 GHz (1.3 GHz and above recommended)
RAM: 1.5 GB RAM (2 GB RAM and above recommended)

comments: While this game can be quite fun at times with the various characters, attractions, and events, the fact that it is basically a neverending money-sucker really takes away from the fun. Most of the Disney characters need to be bought with real money, usually at $10 each go. Then you get a chance of getting some characters, but it isn't guaranteed. I've honestly dumped about $50 into this game and IT IS NOT WORTH IT. It's like a digital pyramid scheme.

With the latest update, they made one of the game currencies (magic) so much harder to obtain. They continue to make events impossible for players who aren't willing to spend their entire paycheck. With each new terrible update, I wonder why I'm still playing. If the next update doesn't remedy the many problems they've introduced, it'll be time to delete. It used to be fun, but man have they taken the joy out of it recently.

My last issue was fixed but now I can't stand how you can now only use 75 characters at a time.... I don't want to keep my characters locked up and like to use them all... with this new update it is even harder to get what is needed to level up characters and with having so many characters forced to be locked up you can't get as much magic! Let me use all my characters already!!!!!!!

could be great. Sounds like it was. Everything takes a ton of time to do, and its a pain collecting for characters. Game only seems possible if you drop a lot of money and a lot of time. For example, Prince Charming. to unlock him took me a bit because I was missing a set of gloves, but finally got him. Did one quest, then I had to level him up which took a while again. Did one quest, and now I have to do all that over and level him up yet again. All about spending real money.

So I love playing this game. But the new update that limits the number of characters allowed out in the park at one time is stupid. I absolutely hate it. Please change it back to letting unlimited number of characters in the park. Also increase magic rewards and more chances for character scrolls would be nice. Park expansion seems a bit high for some parts as well. And bring Ratatouille To the game!!!!

title: First Screen - Orkids
description:
First Screen, a screening tool for Specific Learning Disabilities and related concerns, by Orkids, is a checklist of signs and symptoms which has been tested with over 100 children from different schools and different classes. It caters to school-going children. It is important to keep in mind that the child should have been exposed to at least 1 year of formal instruction (teaching) in a school before attempting to use the tool.

The screening tool is filled by a parent, a teacher or an adult who ‚Äòknows‚Äô the child's academic and behavioural history. The time taken is about 20-25 minutes per child. A feedback report will be generated after the submission of a completed checklist. The report highlights the areas of difficulty the child faces and a suggested action plan.

First Screen, a screening tool for Specific Learning Disabilities and related concerns, by Orkids, is a checklist of signs and symptoms which has been tested with over 100 children from different schools and different classes. It caters to school-going children. It is important to keep in mind that the child should have been exposed to at least 1 year of formal instruction (teaching) in a school before attempting to use the tool.

The screening tool is filled by a parent, a teacher or an adult who ‚Äòknows‚Äô the child's academic and behavioural history. The time taken is about 20-25 minutes per child. A feedback report will be generated after the submission of a completed checklist. The report highlights the areas of difficulty the child faces and a suggested action plan.
summary: A comprehensive screening tool for specific learning disabilities.
recentChanges: First Screen by Orkids - A comprehensive screening tool for neurodevelopmental disabilities including behavioural problems, reading & writing difficulties, attention problems and more.
comments: Great app by ORKIDS for early screening, simple to use and easy to understand. It covers all the areas like reading, writing, attention, emotional and behavioral characteristics As a special educator my experience is that the earlier a child starts intervention services , more beneficial it is for her /him. This app is a good tool for educators and parents alike due to it's simplicity

Good and comprehensive app. It is easy to use and feature of bilingual is great as it can cater to hindi medium school going children. Overly superb app for parents and teachers. Being a councelor i know it would help many children and make it easy for early identification and intervention. The app is good for screening purposes and doesn't label any child instead highlights the areas to be worked on. Looking forward to update and added features.

This is an excellent,user friendly app ... beneficial for parents,teachers or special educators,It would help them to understand the nuances of the areas where a child can be intervened in a more organized manner
An amazing user friendly app ! Easy to understand and use. Gives a very accurate result and is available in English and Hindi. Really helpful in identifying the child's strengths and weaknesses !
Very useful for teachers and parents . Covers all the areas for screening . Above all easy usage .Great boon to the education system of India. Much needed !!

comments: The Samsung A10e is junk. Avoid it. We bought two new phones from our service provider. Neither has ever worked correctly. We've contacted our provider with the problems, only to find we're far from alone! All casual signs point to shoddy processors. Poor reception, incorrect readings showing on screen. Just plain crappy junk. Not worth it!

So I am at this very moment doing an upgrade for this app. When I am doing that I am reading the reviews ( kinda backwards I know) Well every review I have read is saying "run away from these problems " how it is working terrible and even that it cant be uninstalled. I am very nervous and wondering. What did I get my self into?

I'm giving five stars because on all my other phones I've had it works great. But, for some reason this phone the Samsung A01 it asks me to upgrade then tells me it's not compatible, why is this? It's a Samsung Galaxy phone.

This is the phone from hell. Constant error messages so I can't open any unless manage to sneak it in . Now the sound has disappeared unless I put it on speaker phone. This phone was a waist on money just like all the Samsung products I have bought. I am in the hospital and need a phone.
Phone never gets to 100%. Best is 89%. Very frustrating. Other than that it is a good phone. Does more than I ever use it for, though.

title: Talking Ginger
description:
Little Talking Ginger needs your help! Help him get ready for bed and have fun along the way!

Ginger provides the best company - talk to him, tickle him and play games with him. You can even see what he‚Äôs dreaming about at night! 

Enjoy your time with the little kitten, record videos of your fun time together and share them online!

Features:
- Have fun with Ginger: Pet him, poke him, tickle him and hear his cute laugh.
- Talk to Ginger: Talk to the little cat and he‚Äôll repeat in his cute voice.
- Get Ginger ready for bed: Shower and blow dry his fluffy fur, brush his teeth and take him to use the potty.
- Play games with Ginger: Pop toothpaste bubbles, roll down the toilet paper and play the jigsaw puzzle game.
- Collect jigsaw puzzle images: Collect all the snapshots of Ginger‚Äôs vivid dreams.
- Brush teeth with Ginger: Don‚Äôt brush your teeth alone, brush them with Ginger.
- Record videos and share: Record videos of all the fun things Ginger does to send to your friends, or upload on Facebook and YouTube.

This app is PRIVO certified. The PRIVO safe harbor seal indicates Outfit7 has established COPPA compliant privacy practices to protect your child‚Äôs personal information. Our apps do not allow younger children to share their information.

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and contextual advertising
- Links that direct customers to our websites and other Outfit7 apps
- Personalization of content to entice users to play the app again
- Watching videos of Outfit7's animated characters via YouTube integration
- The option to make in-app purchases

Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula-android/
Privacy policy: http://outfit7.com/privacy-policy/

title: First words learn to read full
description:
*** Full Version of the App - No further purchase required *** 

*** Fun educational game for toddlers of age 1.5 and up 
*** English voice over ‚Äì Learn first words
*** Developed with certified child psychologists 
***10 beautiful mini-game boards 

About the game: 
----------------- 
"TinyHands First Words" is an educational game for children of age 1.5 and up. 
The game consists of 10 boards, each focused on a different theme from the child's world such as shapes, colors, clothes, animals and vehicles. 

The game is designed to enhance the following: 
- Hand-eye coordination 
- Concentration 
- Categorization 
- Visual perception 
- Vocabulary 

Game Boards: 
-------------------- 
The game consists of 10 beautiful boards organized in a book like structure with big colourful buttons. This unique structure allows the toddler to easily navigate between the different boards and play independently. The boards were CAREFULLY CHOSEN in order to represent basic concepts from the child's world. 

TinyHands Games:
 
TinyHands Sorting Series
A set of sorting games designed to help children acquire basic concepts such as shape, color, size seasons and animals. Game boards are organized in an ascending difficulty level starting from basic sorting followed by more complex context based sorting and classification environments.

TinyHands Towers Series
A set of stacking games. The game is designed to help children acquire basic concepts such as: big VS. small, before VS. after, and bottom VS. top. Game boards are organized in an ascending difficulty level.

TinyHands What's My Pair Series
A series of three pair matching games. The game challenges the child to match pairs, initially based on visual aspects alone and in more advanced screens based on logic and understanding of card content.

TinyHands First Words Series
A set of vocabulary games for children of age 1.5 and up.
The game consists of 10 boards, each focused on a different theme from the child's world such as shapes, colors, clothes, animals and vehicles.

TinyHands Raccoon TreeHouse
This game is intended for toddlers aged 3+. The game presents 12 boards each focused on developing a set of basic concepts such as size, colors, numbers and patterns using everyday objects from the child's world such as clothes, food and many more.

TinyHands Town Center
Educational game recommended for age 3+. This game includes 10 beautiful boards each focused on developing a set of basic concepts such as size, colors, numbers and patterns using everyday objects from the child's world such as clothes, food and many more.

TinyHands Connect The Dots
The game consists of 12 mini game boards each presents a beautiful and magical scene. Each board contains several parts. The parts can be completed by connecting the numbered dots in a specific order. Upon completion, each part is dragged to gradually build an object. When all parts are drawn the scene is magically created and revealed. Designed for children aged 3+.

Note for parents:
Like all our games, this game is designed to provide quality playtime for parents and children together. Playing along with your children is highly recommended and will surely make them benefit the most from this app and help them expand their vocabulary.

We are sure that your children will enjoy this exciting educational game that will encourage their thinking and contribute to the development of their basic skills.

About the Team: 
We believe that children learn best through playing. We teamed up with certified child psychologists and experienced educators out of desire to create fun games that will help our children acquire new concepts and improve their skills. In addition, we design our games to provide quality playtime for parents and children together.

A set of sorting games designed to help children acquire basic concepts such as shape, color, size seasons and animals. Game boards are organized in an ascending difficulty level starting from basic sorting followed by more complex context based sorting and classification environments.

TinyHands Towers Series
A set of stacking games. The game is designed to help children acquire basic concepts such as: big VS. small, before VS. after, and bottom VS. top. Game boards are organized in an ascending difficulty level.

TinyHands What's My Pair Series
A series of three pair matching games. The game challenges the child to match pairs, initially based on visual aspects alone and in more advanced screens based on logic and understanding of card content.

TinyHands First Words Series
A set of vocabulary games for children of age 1.5 and up.
The game consists of 10 boards, each focused on a different theme from the child's world such as shapes, colors, clothes, animals and vehicles.

TinyHands Raccoon TreeHouse
This game is intended for toddlers aged 3+. The game presents 12 boards each focused on developing a set of basic concepts such as size, colors, numbers and patterns using everyday objects from the child's world such as clothes, food and many more.

TinyHands Town Center
Educational game recommended for age 3+. This game includes 10 beautiful boards each focused on developing a set of basic concepts such as size, colors, numbers and patterns using everyday objects from the child's world such as clothes, food and many more.

TinyHands Connect The Dots
The game consists of 12 mini game boards each presents a beautiful and magical scene. Each board contains several parts. The parts can be completed by connecting the numbered dots in a specific order. Upon completion, each part is dragged to gradually build an object. When all parts are drawn the scene is magically created and revealed. Designed for children aged 3+.

Note for parents:
Like all our games, this game is designed to provide quality playtime for parents and children together. Playing along with your children is highly recommended and will surely make them benefit the most from this app and help them expand their vocabulary.

We are sure that your children will enjoy this exciting educational game that will encourage their thinking and contribute to the development of their basic skills.

About the Team:
We believe that children learn best through playing. We teamed up with certified child psychologists and experienced educators out of desire to create fun games that will help our children acquire new concepts and improve their skills. In addition, we design our games to provide quality playtime for parents and children together.

title: Stages of Child Development
description:
Mam, childhood is a period of growth and development that is important in the lives of every human being. In this period, children learn to master certain skills and deal with new tasks. Therefore, Mam needs to pay close attention to the various development processes that take place in the life of the Little One in this period; starting from the child's cognitive development, motor, sensory, physical, language, and emotional.
Cognitive can be interpreted as the ability to understand something. Cognitive development refers to the ability a child has to understand something. One of the psychology figures who put forward a theory about the stages of cognitive development (cognitive theory) of humans is Jean Piaget. According to Piaget, children have a different way of thinking from adults. Piaget divides the stages of early childhood cognitive development into four stages.
1. Sensorimotor stage (0-24 months)
Every baby is born with innate reflexes and the urge to explore his world. Therefore, at this time, the baby's abilities are limited to his reflexes and five senses. The various reflexes then develop into habits. At this initial stage of cognitive development, the Little can not consider the needs, desires, or interests of others, so he is considered "egocentric".
2. Preoperational stage (2-7 years)
At this time, children can begin to receive stimulation, although it is still very limited. Even Little has entered into the social environment. The hallmark of this stage is that children begin to be able to use mental operations that are rarely and logically inadequate.
3. Concrete operational stage (7-11 years)
At this time, children are able to sort and classify certain objects and situations. The ability to remember and think logically the little one is increasing. He is able to understand the concept of cause and effect rationally and systematically so that the little one can start learning mathematics and reading. At this stage also the character "egocentric" Little disappears slowly. He is now able to see a problem or event from another person's point of view.
4. Formal operational stage (starting at age 11)
At this time, children are able to think abstractly and master reasoning. He can draw conclusions from the available information. He can understand abstract concepts such as love and values. Little can also see the reality is not always black and white, but there is also a "gray gradation" in between. This ability is important, Mam, because it will help her get through the transition from adolescence to adulthood or the real world.

title: Early Child Development Kit Guide
description:
Early Childhood Development Kit Guidance!

Each item was carefully chosen to support the important work you do each day. 

Giving time for and helping children play during times of stress is one of the most important things you can do.

This Kit of activities was created to help you help young children continue to develop their skills for thinking, speaking, and interacting with people and things even when times are very difficult. 

We hope these fun learning activities will help to stimulate children‚Äôs eager minds, quiet their hearts, and give them hope. 

When you help young children feel safe and secure they can be free to learn now and in the future.

title: TalkTablet PRO  Autism AAC, Aphasis, Parkinsons
description:
Award winning TalkTablet PRO is the only fully featured symbols-based AAC app that is available for iOS, Android and Windows tablets...with the ability to share buttons and pages between platforms.   It will also work certain Google Chromebooks.

This version is NOT compatible with Android watches or the SpeechWatch. 

QUESTIONS?  Speak to REAL people at 866-487-1006

To see a feature comparison chart of AAC/speech apps... visit www.TalkTablet.com

TalkTablet PRO¬Æ is a fully-featured AAC speech/communication solution for people who have difficulty communicating as a result of autism, aphasia, Down Syndrome, stroke, laryngectomy or any other condition that affects a persons ability to communicate effectively.  NOW with fully customizable PoP-Up pages!!

TalkTablet PRO is developed by Gus Communication Devices, a leader in speech software for over 25 years.  First released in 2012, TalkTablet has become the premier, reasonably priced, Augmentative and Alternative Communication (AAC) solution for children and adults with autism, aphasia, Rett Syndrome, Down syndrome, developmental disabilities, apraxia, stroke, or traumatic brain injury.

Simplicity by Design
‚Ä¢ Speak by touching buttons that contain predefined words or phrases
‚Ä¢ Add random text to phrases using the embedded on-screen keyboard
* Includes over 30,000+ Symbolstix symbols, the most in the industry

Choose one of the included vocabularies and start communicating today!
‚Ä¢ TalkTablet PRO includes TWELVE (12) SLP designed starter vocabularies that offer 4 to 48 buttons/page.
   OR create a new vocabulary of your own design

Expand your pages along with the user's progression
‚Ä¢ Each grid size (buttons/page) can be increased or decreased at any time to suit your needs
‚Ä¢ Transition to literacy with word prediction

EASY, EASY customization
‚Ä¢ Add buttons, pages, or new vocabularies in a flash.  The most intuitive AAC app available today.

‚Ä¢ Choose from over 30,000 SymbolStix‚Ñ¢ symbols (worlds largest AAC library), or take photos with the camera, use photos from your album, or add Google images to your buttons

‚Ä¢ Create unlimited user vocabularies from a single app

‚Ä¢ Change color, font, borders, backgrounds and more on each button or page

‚Ä¢ Buttons can be made invisible, dimmed or normal

‚Ä¢ Move buttons by simply pressing, holding and dragging to new location

‚Ä¢ Copy and paste buttons between page or user vocabularies

‚Ä¢ Prevent unwanted editing by enabling a password to the editing area

‚Ä¢ Prevent unwanted repeated tapping of buttons with the ‚ÄúTap Delay‚Äù feature

‚Ä¢ Includes natural sounding voices (not robotic) in multiple languages..OR use the included audio recording function to record voices or sounds

* Share buttons, pages or entire vocabularies WIRELESSLY with other TalkTablet users.

‚Ä¢ Built-in backup and restore feature to safeguard your pages, including our free offsite backup service

‚Ä¢ Compatible with handheld and tablet devices running Android

‚Ä¢ An internet connection is NOT required to use TalkTablet.  It is a ‚Äústand alone‚Äù app

‚Ä¢ Includes toll free telephone technical support and free updates‚Ä¶.for LIFE

‚Ä¢ Created by the leader in speech software for over 25 years!!

********************************************************
TalkTablet includes our free TalkTablet Sharing Service which allows users to share buttons, pages of buttons or entire user vocabularies with other TalkTablet users anywhere in the world. Requires an internet connection.
******************************************************** 

Learn more about TalkTablet and view step-by-step video tutorials at www.TalkTablet.com

comments: This is an fantastic app to express forst and feeling

Wont open comes to a page saying not found then loops back to google play Update contacted Google for refund, Google said contact developer. Developer says contact google. Thanks for the run around on an expensive non working app.

Very supportive and responsive support. App has an easy to use UI for communication and seems to be quite customizable. The PIN function to restrict changes to settings is very useful. It does install all images locally but that also allows the app full functionality even when not connected to the internet. The app comes with multiple different page layouts on installation, and has the ability to create custom pages as well. However, I did have to explore myself the various settings and options available in the app, and how they changed the functionality and interface of the app. The degree of customization is great, such as custom buttons with personal images and sound recordings for true personalization of expression but these options can feel a little overwhelming for those that are unfamiliar with AAC apps or communication apps in general. Some sort of in app onboarding to help new users customize the app to their communication needs where new users can view the default page types/layouts easily when they first start the app, and a help/guide function or library explaining the different options available to users as far as customization and control goes would be very helpful. If there is a manual included in the application, it is not easily located. Otherwise, this app suits our needs perfectly, and I would definitely recommend this app.

Wonderful speech app and incredible customer service. We've been using Proloquo2go for years and with each new version it is increasingly difficult to use, NO customer support in the US, and is so ridiculously expensive. Our school recommended TalkTablet and we are so much happier now. It has been a breath of fresh air. So much easier and more intuitive to use. No comparison. And the fellow we called at TalkTablet with some questions, before and after purchasing was outstanding 5*

I am a community support worker who supports many people with speech difficulties of different types. This app is by far the best app in versatility, usability, and price. Customer support is the best that I've found, you accually get to talk to a real person if there are any questions which have been far and few in between do to the extreme user friendliness of this app. I can't say enough good things about the creater of this program, it has changed many people's lives. Thank You!

title: Abcd learning for nursery children free
description:
Abcd learning for nursery children is  preschool educational game for kids , using this game kids learning numbers counting and alphabets writing and after practice he will be master in kindergarten.

Now Learning numbers & alphabets will be easier with our new Abc 123 Tracing for children , we integrate animated letters with phonics sounds so preschool kids will master in English pronunciation of consonants and vowels. all letters is upper-case as well as lower-case with dashed line with number so it can easily understand how to tracing alphabets it will help your child develop them outside the classroom.

tap on the letter to listen phonics sounds , so that baby can acquire knowledge of correct English Alphabet and numbers pronunciation it will improve vocabulary skill and children learning to recognize and identify abcd and 1234 with enjoyment in this kids education game.

this game is specially released for 4,5 years old kindergartner ,or preschool age child they can learn English letter,numbers step by step just by following the arrow line with their finger.kids learn the numbers with fun flash card ,count and hear the words. 

How to Play :
download and install this Montessori learning app on your device and tap on play button to start, choose alphabet or number which you want to start with ,it will show worksheet with perfect path with numbers, drag your figure to write number and alphabet with different color, children can easily find out how to write letters and from where he should start tracing. once you finished go ahead with next one. after practice 123 and abc's with this game child can do it without help.

title: REAL GUITAR: Virtual Guitar Free
description:
Whether you're already a dab hand, or an axe rookie but have always wanted to learn, this app will help you live the dream! We bring you REAL GUITAR: the best and most comprehensive guitar app on Google Play.

Playing is simplicity itself! REAL GUITAR is an app that transforms your phone / tablet screen into a lifelike simulation of an acoustic or electric guitar.

A fun, light and user-friendly app. Ideal for anyone who wants to study or play guitar without bugging the neighbours or taking up too much space.

You can play chords and pick solos, as well as jam along to music in real time.

Sounds recorded in studio-quality audio.

The library boasts more than 1500 different chords, allowing you to play along to any track you like.

Check out the Real Guitar specs:
- No latency
- Studio-quality audio
- Range of customised chords
- 3 types of acoustic / electric guitars
- 3 playing modes
- 16 loops to jam along with
- More than 1500 chords
- High-fidelity guitar sounds
- Recording mode
- Export your recordings to MP3
- Works with all screen resolutions - Phones & Tablets (HD images)
- Free app
- Easy to use

The app is free but you can remove the ads by purchasing a licence!

Play, strum, pick and pluck to your heart's content with the most comprehensive guitar app on Google Play! Perfect for all kinds of guitarists, professional musicians, amateurs or beginners.

Touch & Play!

title: Learn with Rufus: Emotions
description:
Have fun learning how facial expressions reveal what people are feeling!

Learn with Rufus: Feelings and Emotions aims to help children learn the facial expressions that correspond to feelings and emotions including happy, sad, angry, afraid, disgusted, and surprised. Children will learn how to identify easier fully-formed emotions and more difficult subtle emotions. The game is highly customizable to meet the needs of children with varying skills, ability levels, and learning styles.

This game was designed by Dr Holly Gastgeb, a clinical and developmental psychologist with over ten years of experience working with typically developing children and children with autism spectrum disorder (ASD). Her research has shown that children with ASD have difficulty identifying emotions from an early age. Since this ability is developed throughout childhood, the game is beneficial for a wide range of children including early achievers without any diagnosed learning difficulties.

Learn with Rufus: Feelings and Emotions is organized into a learning phase and two games:
‚Ä¢ Learning - A preview of the facial expressions is shown to the child before the game starts.
‚Ä¢ Find It! - Shown a number of facial expressions, the child is directed to select a specific emotion.
‚Ä¢ Name It! - Shown a single facial expression, the child is asked to name the emotion.

To keep children interested and motivated, the following features are included:
‚Ä¢ Reward sets - Choose from nine different colorful child-friendly reward sets including bugs, cars, cats, and more.
‚Ä¢ Toy break - The child is given periodic breaks with fun on-screen fingerpainting. This feature can be turned off if the child does not need breaks or finds them distracting.
‚Ä¢ Positive reinforcement - Rufus does a "happy dance" and gives positive verbal reinforcement when the child answers correctly. If the child answers incorrectly, the correct answer is restated.
‚Ä¢ Music and sounds - Child-friendly music and sounds are included. This feature can be turned off if the child is sensitive to or distracted by sounds and music.
‚Ä¢ Text - The word that corresponds to each picture is presented above the picture. This feature can be turned off if the words are distracting to the child.
‚Ä¢ Emoticons - Emoticons that correspond to the emotions are presented. This feature can be turned off to increase difficulty.

Additional customizable features that are present include:
‚Ä¢ Level of difficulty - The level of difficulty can be adjusted to match the child's ability level:
Easy - Facial expressions with quickly identifiable emotions
Medium - Facial expressions with a mix of slightly less identifiable emotions
Hard - Facial expressions with partially formed emotions
Expert - Facial expressions with subtle emotions
‚Ä¢ Training - The practice session before the games may be disabled to increase difficulty.
‚Ä¢ Group Size - Choose from a group size for the game phase depending on the child's ability level. Group size can be 2 or 4 for Find It! and group size can be 2, 4, or 6 for Name It!
‚Ä¢ Languages - Choose from English and Spanish.

For parents, educators, and therapists:
‚Ä¢ Profiles per child - More than one child can play the game and all data is stored under each child's name.
‚Ä¢ Track data and statistics - At the end of the game, a graph of the child's data is presented. Touch the graph to enlarge it, then touch each data point to gather information about the child's performance. If the device is capable of email, select the Export button to send a CSV file of the data.

For Ages 4 & Up

title: Time Timer Visual Productivity
description:
Time Timer is here to help. We‚Äôve made our app free to help everyone create better structure during this time of uncertainty.  Thank you and stay well. 

What happens when you can see time? Stress-free productivity. Time Timer features an iconic red disk that disappears as the seconds go by to create a fun and easy visual timer. Perfect for school, work, home or gym, it makes time make sense for everyone.

Start improving your time management skills with one simple swipe of your finger. That‚Äôs all it takes to set the length of your timer; then hit play to start the visual countdown. 

Time Timer¬Æ is the ORIGINAL timer to turn the passage of time into something visual and concrete with a time circle.

Increase focus and change your life at ‚Ä¶ 

Work ‚Äì Get more done with this ultimate productivity boost. Run effective meetings and brainstorming sessions. Leverage Time Timer as a tool for design sprints or lean innovation.

School ‚Äì Help students see and understand the passage of time. Manage transitions successfully. Break big tasks down into smaller, more manageable pieces. Give older students a tool to manage their workload.

Bulk install and run on student Google Chromebooks. 

Home ‚Äì Empower anyone to manage their routines and cut down on the constant, ‚ÄúHow much longer?‚Äù Now they‚Äôll see when play time is over. And know what it means when you say ‚Äú10 minutes until bed time.‚Äù 

Or use it as a focus timer to manage everyday adult tasks like cooking, cleaning and yard work.

Special needs ‚Äì ADHD. Autism. Learning disabilities. Senior care. Physical or occupational therapy. Dyslexia. Turn to Time Timer to ease transitions, establish routines and encourage more independence for kids and adults. 

Gym ‚Äì Clocks are boring. Stay motivated during your workout as every step on the treadmill or stair climber makes the disk disappear. Or set up repeating Timers perfect for interval training. 

Ready to take charge of your time? Download Time Timer today. 

Media and Awards
-Edison Award for Innovation Winner (Productivity Category)
-Featured in Better Homes & Gardens and The Huffington Post 

Testimonials
‚ÄúSince using the Time Timer, my meetings have never been more efficient or effective. People actually want to attend because I don't waste their time.‚Äù 

‚ÄúI have been using your Time Timer software for several years when administering science labs, SAT testing, timed classroom presentations, etc. Both teachers and students find it easy to use and view. A great professional tool for classroom use.‚Äù 

App Features
-Save and reuse Timers  
-Change colors and sounds to suit your mood or preference 
-Set repeating Timers; up to 99 consecutive Timers on a single play
-Adjust the timer disk to represent anywhere from 1 second to 99 hours
-Already use the original Time Timer? Default to the same red disk and 60-minute time scale
-View the app vertically or horizontally as you change the direction of your device
-Built with battery life in mind
-Supports Google Chromebooks

About Time Timer
Time Timer LLC creates a whole range of award-winning Timers, including a line of physical Timers to set on your desk or kitchen countertop. With a 20-year track record, the company focuses on helping everyone measure and manage time more effectively. 

Questions? Email support@timetimer.com or visit https://www.timetimer.com/AndroidSupport for answers to frequently asked questions.

Find more Time Timer products at https://timetimer.com

comments: Too much visual clutter! (get the open source app Visual Timer instead.) I use the "time timer" clocks IRL and this does NOT deliver the same experience.

I love the physical timers and got this for the road. App is greatly improved from a year ago. You can save multiple timers with labels and colours. One request is to have a persistent notification while the timer is running so the user can quickly check the time left if on another app. Love that you can keep the screen awake!

The UI is trying a bit too hard to be simple and it manages to do the opposite. And yes, the price is a bit high. But it works, it's consistent, and has helped me with my problems of knowing that time is passing. If you have ADHD or any other condition with a similar time impairment, I recommend it.

It's a nice feature. I hope they can add pomodoro function too with asking if we want go proceed to the next session which can be great for project or simply doing a routine with a smooth transition between tasks with necessary breaks as some of us may forget to take a break. Add more variety of colors too! Also adding a widget would be nice and/or having a visual timer on the notification beside the text when away from the app.

Hi, I am a huge Time timer suporter and I use it regularly.  I started using it in my Ipad, Iphone and then I bought a TimeTimer wrist watch too.  I have have always wanted time timer on a smart watch and now I see you have finally released it on apple watch. Unfortunately I switched from apple to Samsung last year and now I have a Samsung Galaxy watch. I do hope that Time Timer is planning to release a galaxy watch app soon too and would like to know when it will be available.   Thank You.

title: ADHD  - Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder
description:
** ADHD  - Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder App is owned by a private company not affiliated, endorsed, authorized, or licensed by the US National Institute of Mental Health (NIMH) or other government entity.

This app will help learn about ADHD - Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder. ADHD Basic Information, Symptoms and Diagnosis, Treatment, Other Concerns & Conditions, Information and Resources for States.

App activities:

- Basic Information: ADHD is one of the most common neurodevelopmental disorders of childhood. It is usually first diagnosed in childhood and often lasts into adulthood. 
- Symptoms and Diagnosis: Deciding if a child has ADHD is a several-step process. This page gives you an overview of how ADHD is diagnosed.
- Treatment: There are many treatment options, so parents should work closely with everyone involved in the child‚Äôs life‚Äîhealthcare providers, therapists, teachers, coaches, and other family members.
- Other Concerns & Conditions: Attention-Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) often occurs with other disorders. About 2 in 3 of children with ADHD referred to clinics have other disorders as well as ADHD.
- Information and Resources for States: States can play an important role in treatments for children with ADHD. They can monitor how health resources are utilized, implement ADHD treatment policies, and shape access to behavioral health services.
- Articles and Key Findings About ADHD. Key Findings. Featured Articles. Scientific Articles.
- News on ADHD
- ADHD Videos

Sources of the information in the app: 
https://www.usa.gov
https://www.nimh.nih.gov

title: Pregnant Mother Simulator - Virtual Pregnancy Game
description:
I'm Pregnant üë©‚Äç‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüë© . The story of pregnant mother starts from the pregnancy test in this amazing pregnant simulator. With motherhood news you are now a pregnant mommy. 
Experience real life simulation in giving birth games and family games.

ü©∏ Virtual Pregnancy Video Game: Virtual Pregnant simulator depicits the life game story of a mother right from the start of the pregnancy. Pregnant mom is so excited about the newborn üë∂üèº. She has to take care of herself for babycare. 

ü©∏ Pregnant Mom Life:  She now has to follow a managed life in 1st, 2nd and third trimesters. In first trimester she has to rest avoid stairs and take necessary precautions to avoid miscarriage. 
2nd trimester she has to start workouts pregnancy workouts and pregnancy yoga exercises has to performed in her daily routine along with a healthy diet. 

ü©∏ Childbirth Games: Pregnant games for girls normal delivery. Grow your family in this mother simulator game. Pregnant daycare routine must be followed that includes; Having enough sleep, doing yoga and exercises, taking your vitamins and following a healthy diet plan. Being pregnant and babycare isn't an easy task. Check with your pregnancy doctor games. Take plenty of fruits üçè. 
In this babysitting game mommy & newborn baby checkup is very important as it can lead to many complications. As a babysitter keep checking blood pressure
and Blood sugar levels of the pregnant mom to monitor her health and normal growth of baby.

Features:
‚òÖ A mother game who will perform her daily activities after being pregnant. 
‚òÖ Pregnancy test and doctor visit for routine checkup. 
‚òÖ Brisk Walking and other pregnancy exercises in this mom game. 
‚òÖ Taking healthy diet and monitoring baby growth. 
‚òÖ Complete pregnancy period to parenthood.  
‚òÖ Medical care of Pregnant Mama. 
‚òÖ Patient mama's clothes and other accessories during parenthood period. 
‚òÖ Be prepared for the pregnant mama emergancy doctor in case of Cesarean.

üëçüèª Your newborn baby will be active if you are active. Go to the hospital and meet your doctor in this hospital game. This is a family game, a mother game, a hospital game and
 ultimately an amazing pregnancy game as you will be going through all these phases of experience in a fun and realistic way. 

üëçüèª Pregnancy To-dos in this fun game of 2020. One of the best simulation games 2020. Pregnant surgery game will end at your delivery day. Regularly visit your 
pregnancy doctor in this hospital game. You must also be prepared for the hospital emergency for the labor just in case you get into any complications. Also keep your
maternity bag ready. Be a good pregnant mommy. 

Don't forget to give your feedback at neelumbajiplc@gmail.com

comments: This game is ok I would never play this in my freetime, and I don't like the animaton. It's terrible and the animation sucks! It looks like the creator just rushed it when it could have been a good game but you rushed it. If your pregnant and you want to learn about being pregnant I do recommend, but for all of you that are not, look at something else!!!

The is perfect for pregnant women. It teaches you everything i am very proud of the creators. But the reason i reduced a star because you cannot operate the woman that's a little disappointing. Creators if you are reading this its a humble request to add this feature please please. I love this game and i dont want to uninstall it.

Very good game...portrays a pregnant mother's life accurately. Excellent! The only thing is that I felt the 'Baby Care' level a bit boring. The rest was all excellent! Going to hospital, ordering items from iPhone....very good. Just improve 'Baby Care' level and then include more and more of levels...overall, nice game!üëçüëç sufficient to get 4 stars!!

FINALLY A GAME WITH EASY CONTROLS !!!!!! I love this game I just wish it had more levels and more to do so far everything is so accurate! Maybe giving baby a bath more levels of baby getting older feeding him in a high chair changing clothes etc mom cooking going to the store taking baby for a walk in stroller or if baby grows and walks as a toddler take him to play ! title: Creative Learning Center
description:
Creative Learning Center is a user-friendly mobile application specifically designed for parents who have children enrolled in Creative Learning Center Nursery. It's an app that will constantly connect parents to their kids and also with the preschool's staff.
Creative Learning Center app allows parents to: 

- Follow their child's progress on daily basis at the nursery.
- Read the daily reports that the teacher provides about the children.
- Stay informed about the latest news, announcements and events of Creative Learning Center.
- Review the daily schedule and food menus their kids enjoy.
- Get details of various events and send electronic approval for their children participation at them.
- View child's photos as soon as they are taken whether in class or events and be able to share or save them.
- Chat with the care center administration and/or teachers.
- Track Your Kids‚Äô bus while going to Creative Learning Center and returning back home from Creative Learning Center.

comments: Great game...BUT! Had issues with this game a year ago, but thought I'd give it another go. Graphics and game play are excellent, however I bought credits (AU$70), bet big, won free games (Where's The Gold) then the game froze. Restarted it, recovered the game then froze again. Restarted it, same thing. Third time it just took the free games. No reply from support. You bet big with the hope of winning free games, then it takes away your prize.

This app has the best graphics....but thats it. I've tried buying credits etc to 'pay my way' for better payouts, but all Product Madness are concerned about is making you pay more for something worthless. There is no way you can win any money back, its supposed to be for fun, but you have to pay big ongoing premiums to have any 'fun'. Until l see a better return on the money I've paid so far, they'll not get another penny out of me. You are better off saving your money for real gambling.

I keep wanting to give this game more stars, but they just wont let me. Yes I'm very happy that you put way better values on the daily wheel. Yes I play this game because the games are ones I've played in real casinos...i can't give more than one star because you just make it impossible to win anything...when you go through 5 million coins betting minimum and never get a bonus or win anything higher than double your bet you just want to give up. Plus, the cost of buying coins is ridiculous.

I think its great , you know it costs them money to put these games on here, so to anyone that's not happy just remember these games are free, and entertaining , And it takes our minds off of today's problems, Tomas blanco

Total scam. Fixed games and they expect you to pay for credits? Games don't pay, stupid and totally unnecessary side games (open boxes for items or scratch fixed lottery tickets). The only good thing about this app is that the games look like the real deal but the overall experience is terrible.

title: Learning Arabic With KATKUTI -alphabets read write
description:
To get more content - subscribe to our channel :
https://goo.gl/6B7xn5

A great app for teaching your children not only the Arabic alphabets, but also to read and write basic words.

With the free "Learn Letters" in the app menu, your child will learn the sounds of letters, matching words and images.

For each letter we prepared 3 images and words, you can unlock the additional 2 words/images to enrich your child vocabulary. 
The app will teach your child the 3 different shapes for each letter while playing matching shapes, assembling words and other games.

Choose the set of letters to present in games, by default "Hamza"-"Dal" are enabled, for other letters click the setting button and select the letters to work with..


Kids like playing more than learning in early ages, 
So we developed 5 additional games making it funny to your child to increase the learning progress and finally enrich his vocabulary!

Our Farms family will join your child in 6 games and mini apps :
 1- Pronounced letters - your child will pop the balloons with the pronounced letter - that's fun !!
 2- Reorder letters, he will help the farmer to re order the alphabets in the correct order.
 3- Match letter shapes (beginning, middle and end of word) - he will help our farmer to match letters..
 4- Guess the Pic, will learn to recognize written words by images
 5- Guess the Word, after your child learned the letters and words, it's the time to learn writing and assembling words.
6- Writing Arabic alphabets - will assist your child to write letters and help finding the correct path to write letter.

All games includes vocal instructions, to enable him use it without the need of your help.

Your child will collect many presents after completing each round in games.

You get all this for free!! However games are limited for set of letters and only one image for letter.
So If you found it's useful, you can open the additional locked letters.

We are continuing to develop this app, and what you pay now for (3 images for letter) package, will include additional future images.

* Our apps are integrated now in centers for preparing children for school, in kindergartens and for home web access.
From now: you can register to our web site, www.katkuti.com , and benefit from similar games and apps with the desktop version.

1- Pronounced letters - your child will pop the balloons with the pronounced letter - that's fun !!
2- Reorder letters, he will help the farmer to re order the alphabets in the correct order.
3- Match letter shapes (beginning, middle and end of word) - he will help our farmer to match letters..
4- Guess the Pic, will learn to recognize written words by images
5- Guess the Word, after your child learned the letters and words, it's the time to learn writing and assembling words.
6- Writing Arabic alphabets - will assist your child to write letters and help finding the correct path to write letter.

All games includes vocal instructions, to enable him use it without the need of your help.

Your child will collect many presents after completing each round in games.

You get all this for free!! However games are limited for set of letters and only one image for letter.
So If you found it's useful, you can open the additional locked letters.

We are continuing to develop this app, and what you pay now for (3 images for letter) package, will include additional future images.

* Our apps are integrated now in centers for preparing children for school, in kindergartens and for home web access.
From now: you can register to our web site, www.katkuti.com , and benefit from similar games and apps with the desktop version.
